body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Attack with a creature
2. if it's not blocked, use Ninjutsu
3. Sakashima's Student is put onto battlefield as a 0/0 creature, most likely dying the very same moment (if you don't have a Glen Elandra Liege out there)
author: [Landhotel.Westerwald](https://code.google.com/u/Landhotel.Westerwald/)
title: Sakashima's Student: using its Ninjutsu ability creates a 0/0 creature

comments.body:
Looking at the groovy, it's only been coded to trigger cloning when cast, not when it enters the battlefield via ninjutsu (or other means, eg flicker)

**Status:** Accepted
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)
